text_settings_showadd: Nuna maballin "ƙara" a cikin manyan fayiloli
text_importexport_content: Anan zaka iya shigo da fitarwa alamun shafi a cikin tsarin Netscape.
text_error_loadfile: kuskure: ba zai iya ɗaukar fayil ba.
text_help_content:
Alamomin Alamomi aikace-aikace ne wanda yake taimakawa wajan adanawa da shirya alamun shafi.

Don ƙirƙirar sabon alamar, ko sabon babban fayil, latsa alamar "ƙari": zaɓi tsakanin alamar shafi da babban fayil, saka take sannan kuma daga karshe URL din, saika latsa adana don adana canje-canje, ko latsa share don share alamar, ko komawa baya don tsallake canje-canjen amma kiyaye alamar.

Latsa madannin "bude" kusa da alamar bude adireshin da yake da alaka.

Latsa madannin "kara" a cikin babban fayil dan kara sabon abu a ciki.

Ga alamun shafi biyu da manyan fayiloli, danna maballin "gyara" don gyara su, latsa maɓallin "matsa baya" don musanya matsayi tare da ɓangaren da ya gabata, latsa maɓallin "matsa gaba" don musanya matsayin tare da ɓangaren na gaba, latsa maɓallin "matsa sama" don matsar da ɓangaren daga cikin fayil ɗin a halin yanzu shine, ko latsa maɓallin "matsa ƙasa" don matsar da ɓangaren cikin ƙaramin fayil mai zuwa.

A cikin menu na saitunan, mai sauƙin amfani bayan danna kan gunkin "saituna", zaku iya ɓoye ko nuna maɓallin gyara, motsi da ƙari. Haka nan yana yiwuwa a sauya yaren amfani da shi.

Don shigo ko fitar da alamun shafi, danna gunkin shigowa / fitarwa. Tsarin Alamar Alamar HTML Netscape yana da goyan baya, saboda haka yana yiwuwa a shigo da alamomin da manyan masu binciken yanar gizo suka fitar. Lokacin shigo da alamomin daga fayil, alamun shafi na yanzu za a share su kuma a sake rubuta su.

Manajan Alamomin Alamomi ne na Aikace-aikacen Yanar Gizon Ci Gaban, wanda ke nufin cewa yana gudana a cikin burauzar. Lokacin da ka girka shi, yayin da ba a nuna abubuwan binciken ba, har yanzu yana gudana a cikin mai bincike. Alamun shafi an adana su a cikin adreshin mai bincike don yankin alamomin.marcoparrone.com. LocalStorage na aiki lafiya tare da masu bincike na Chrome, Edge da Firefox. Wasu masu bincike zasu iya shareShagon gida bayan wani lokaci. Android ta tsoho yana amfani da Chrome, Windows ta tsoho yana amfani da Edge. Manajan Alamomin shafi a halin yanzu ba a tallafawa kan samfuran Apple. Tare da manufar taimakawa don hana asarar alamomin, ana ba da shawarar yin ajiyar ajiya ta amfani da aikin "fitarwa", duk lokacin da kuka yi wasu gyare-gyare waɗanda ba ku son rasawa.
text_about_content1:
Hakkin mallaka © 2017,2019,2020,2021 Marco Parrone.
Dukkan hakkoki. ”pp AMMA BA A TA'BATAR DA GARANTIN SAMUN KASUWANCI BA, KYAUTA A KASANCEWA TA KASANCEWA MUTANE DA RASHIN YIN RUFEWA. BABU WANI ABU DA ZAI YI WA MALAMAI KO MASU KWADAYI A CIKIN KWADAYI DUK WANI LAIFI, LALACEWA KO SAURAN LAYYA, KO A HANYAR KWAQIQI, TAUYA KO WATA, TA FITO DAGA, TA WAJE KO TA HADAWA DA SOFTWARE KO AMFANI KO SAURAN MAGANA SOFTWARE.
text_about_content2: WANNAN HIDIMAR NA KUNSAN FASSARA DA GOOGLE YAYI MAKA. GOOGLE YAYI FADA DA DUKKAN GARANTI DANGANE DA FASSARA, BAYANAI KO AIKI, GAME DA KOWANE GARANTI NA INGANTA, AMINCI, DA KOWANE GARANTI NA HANKALIN SANA'A, KYAUTA A BANGAREN NUKA DA NON.
text_about_content3:
An fassara wannan ƙa'idodin yanar gizon don saukakawarku ta amfani da software na fassarar da Google Translate ke bayarwa. Anyi ƙoƙari mai ma'ana don samar da ingantacciyar fassara, kodayake, babu fassarar atomatik mai kyau kuma ba ana nufin maye gurbin masu fassarar ɗan adam ba. An bayar da fassarori a matsayin sabis ga masu amfani da gidan yanar gizon marcoparrone.com, kuma ana bayar da su "kamar yadda yake." Babu wani garantin kowane iri, ko dai an bayyana ko a bayyane, da aka yi game da daidaito, aminci, ko daidaito na duk fassarar da aka yi daga Ingilishi zuwa kowane yare. Wasu abubuwan (kamar su hotuna, bidiyo, Filashi, da sauransu) mai yiwuwa ba za a fassara su daidai ba saboda iyakokin software ɗin fassarar.

Rubutun hukuma shi ne shafin yanar gizon Ingilishi. Duk wani bambancin ra'ayi ko bambance-bambance da aka kirkira a cikin fassarar ba abin ɗaurawa bane kuma ba shi da wani tasiri na doka don bin doka ko dalilai na tilastawa. Idan duk wata tambaya ta taso dangane da daidaiton bayanin da ke cikin gidan yanar gizon da aka fassara, koma zuwa shafin yanar gizon Ingilishi wanda shine aikin hukuma.
